items.content_html: This repository hosts the source code for a QR code scanner app developed for iOS and Android platforms using React Native. The app allows users to scan QR codes via their device camera, providing real-time feedback and displaying decoded data. It supports various QR code formats and features a lightweight UI.
items.title: Jay-Padhara/Qrscan: This repository hosts the source code for a QR code scanner app developed for iOS and Android platforms using React Native. The app allows users to scan QR codes via their device camera, providing real-time feedback and displaying decoded data. It supports various QR code formats and features a lightweight UI.
